GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.17.2
GSD.description:
scsi: qla2xxx: Fix crash during module load unload test

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 67f744f73eba870ab96411d0310e831a4adc3713, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit 62e9dd177732843ae6c5b9d2ed61e7c9538fa276. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: qla2xxx: Fix crash during module load unload test
